Final Comments
Final Comments

Increased data flows accompany economic growth
Increased data flows accompany economic growth

Data flows will continue to expand and become more complex
Data flows will continue to expand and become more complex

Tools and techniques exist to manage data flows
Tools and techniques exist to manage data flows

A systemic approach that considers the entire life cycle of data can
A systemic approach that considers the entire life cycle of data can

help create governance and accountability
help create governance and accountability

That one begins the process to build governance systems and culture
That one begins the process to build governance systems and culture

is more important than where one begins.
is more important than where one begins.
